name: Rapid Firecannon
simpleDescription: Movement builds charges that release a sieging fire attack on release

passives.name: Energized
passives.effects: Moving and basic attacking generates ''Energize'' stacks, up to 100.

passives.name: Sharpshooter
passives.effects: When fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack deals {{as|40 '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]]. ''Energized'' attacks gain 35% '''bonus''' range, capped at 150.
